'''{{class|Actor}}'''
{{c|void '''ResetModelFlags'''()}}
{{c|void '''A_ResetModelFlags'''()}} â€” ''Action function version for calling from {{class|StateProvider}} and {{class|PSprite|PSprites}}.''
== Usage == Resets the flags of the model currently attached to the actor to the values defined in [[MODELDEF]].
== See also == * [[SetModelFlag]] * [[ClearModelFlag]]
[[Category:ZScript]]
